content:
Product Attributes in Product Specs

Product attributes are key pieces of the Vlocity Insurance and Vlocity Health platform. They define coverages, insured items, and other parts of insurance products and health plans. Attributes include inputs to rating (pricing), and characteristics that define claims.

Attributes correspond to anything important for quoting, rating, and writing an insurance policy. For example, a car's make, model, and year are three things that define a car as an insured item and affect the rating of an auto insurance policy.

In health and life insurance, the rating is impacted by the age, gender, and marital status of the person being insured.

Attributes in Context
Insurance products and health plans are made up of collections of attributes. Coverage specs, insured item specs, insured party specs, and rating fact specs are all comprised of lists of attributes.

Attribute categories make it easy for users to find and use the right attributes when they create product specs.
Product attributes define coverages, insured items, and other parts of insurance products and health plans.
Use power attributes to track limits, deductibles, copays, coinsurance, and out of pocket maximums. Create power attributes in the same way as regular attributes, in the same attribute categories.

Create Attribute Categories
Create Attributes
Create Power Attributes
title: Understanding Insurance Product Attributes
